role.argrole: things that are mixed in arg0

example.parse: (IP (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *pro*)) (VP (VV 揉和) (AS 著) (NP-OBJ (NP (DNP (NP (NP-PN (NR 广东)) (NP (NN 餐点))) (DEG 的)) (NP (NN 甜味))) (CC 和) (NP (NP (ADJP (JJ 古老)) (NP-PN (NR 印度))) (CP (WHNP-2 (-NONE- *OP*)) (CP (IP (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-2)) (VP (VA 浓郁))) (DEC 的))) (NP (NN 滋味))))))
example.arg: 广东 餐点 的 甜味 和 古老 印度 *OP* *T*-2 浓郁 的 滋味
